attributes.comment:
In reference to raising fees for the USCIS I-600A, please reconsider this possibilty.
We are in the process of adopting from China and have approximately another 18
months to wait for a child referral. We have no control over these timeframes. We
have already paid to have the paperwork and fingerprints done in full.
Unfortunately, all I-600A applications are expiring due to the fact that they only
remain valid for 18 months from date of issue. It was difficult enough to have to
pay the fees once, but to pay INCREASED fees a second time will more than
double our initial USCIS expenses. Please help your constituents in this matter.
Thank you for your time,
Monica & Kevin Giffhorn
Mount Airy, MD
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Monica & Kevin Giffhorn
